mapper.select: SELECT P1.SVPD_PD_CD AS CODE_ID , P1.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 AS CODE_NAME FROM () P1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND P1.SVPD_ITEM_KND = #{itmKndCd} ORDER BY P1.SVPD_PD_CD

SELECT WARE_NO AS WARE_NO , SUBSTR(WARE_NM, 1, 5) AS WARE_NM , TO_NUMBER(SORT_DV_VAL) AS SORT_DV_VAL FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') /* 서비스센터, 영업센터 */ AND WARE_DTL_DV_CD IN ('20', '30') AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND WARE_NM IS NOT NULL AND (WARE_NM LIKE '%센터' OR WARE_NM LIKE '%지점') UNION ALL ( SELECT WARE_NO AS WARE_NO , SUBSTR(WARE_NM, 1, 4) AS WARE_NM , 0 AS SORT_DV_VAL FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE WARE_NO IN('100002') /* 물류센터 */ AND APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' ) UNION ALL /* 합계,LP,엔지니어 컬럼 정의 */ ( SELECT '100000' AS WARE_NO , '계' AS WARE_NM , 0 AS SORT_DV_VAL FROM DUAL UNION ALL (SELECT '200000' AS WARE_NO , '계' AS WARE_NM , 0 AS SORT_DV_VAL FROM DUAL ) UNION ALL (SELECT '300000' AS WARE_NO , '계' AS WARE_NM , 0 AS SORT_DV_VAL FROM DUAL )
UNION ALL (SELECT '299999' AS WARE_NO , '엔지니어' AS WARE_NM , 0 AS SORT_DV_VAL FROM DUAL ) UNION ALL (SELECT '399999' AS WARE_NO , 'LP' AS WARE_NM , 0 AS SORT_DV_VAL FROM DUAL ) ) ORDER BY WARE_NO ASC, WARE_NM ASC, SORT_DV_VAL ASC
